ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Табели за сигнализация и табели за светлинна сигнализация
Panneaux de signalisation et panneaux de signalisation lumineux
Cartelli stradali e cartelli stradali luminosi
Panouri de semnalizare şi panouri de semnalizare luminoase

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Supply and Installation of GM Connected Wayfinding Products

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: — GM Connected Wayfinding is an initiative to provide a wayfinding system for Greater Manchester. The ambitions for this proposal extend across the urban environment, across all modes, supporting ease of modal interchange and onward journey planning from the beginning to the end of a journey,

— Following completion of a design solution progressed by TfGM, Manchester City Council and other stakeholders (initially for Phase 1 — GM Connected), TfGM are now procuring a framework agreement (single supplier) for the supply and installation of the physical products (arrival displays and static totems), to be located at strategic nodes and removal of existing street furniture ('decluttering'),

— This framework agreement will have an initial call-off for GM Connected that is intended to deliver Phase 1 (delivery area between Piccadilly and Victoria Rail Stations), and the instruction of other subsequent phases and/or requirements during the term will be subject to funding,

— A single contractor is to be appointed under the framework with a call-off arrangement, using agreed terms and rates for different phases and elements required over the term of the framework agreement. This will ensure consistency of design and approach.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: — A single contractor is to be appointed under the framework with a call-off arrangement, using agreed terms and rates for delivery of different phases and elements required over the term, subject to funding. A maintenance option requirement will be included in the call-off arrangement, however TfGM reserve the right to progress the award of an agreement without the maintenance requirement,

— The framework is intended to be available for use or 'call-off' by TfGM and any affiliated organisations and successor organisations including the Greater Manchester Combined Authority (GMCA), Rail North, Transport for North (TfN), the ten members of the Association of Greater Manchester Authorities, The ten members of the Urban transport group and Cheshire West and Chester Council,
— The duration of the framework will not exceed 4 years,

— The lower end of the value range specified is the estimated minimum value of estimated supplies and associated works to be instructed based on the initial requirement for GM Connected Phase 1 within Manchester city centre between Manchester Piccadilly and Manchester Victoria stations,

— The upper end of the range beyond the 750 000 GBP budget for Phase 1 reflects potential funding that may be obtained for similar provision during the term of the framework, however there is no further detail on other available funding beyond that identified for Phase 1,
— The value of future potential phases and requirements will vary,
— There is no guarantee given relating to supplies and associated works to be instructed via the framework agreement,

— A maintenance requirement will be included in the call-off arrangement and appropriate rates sought. TfGM reserves the right to progress the award of a framework agreement based on the inclusion of supply, install, ‘decluttering’ and reinstatement only.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: A Performance bond / Parent company guarantee may be required. Further details will be set out in the invitation to tender documentation made available via Pro-contract.

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Further details will be set out in the invitation to tender documentation made available via Pro-contract.

LEGAL_FORM.P: Alliances and Consortiums are not required to form a new legal entity to provide the works, however Alliances and Consortiums will be required to accept Joint and several liability. Further details will be set out in the invitation to tender documentation made available via Pro-contract.

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: Transport for Greater Manchester's particular conditions are set out in the invitation to tender documentation made available via Pro-contract.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Information, formalities and necessary requirements to be met will be set out in invitation to tender documentation which will be made available via Pro-contract.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Information, formalities and necessary requirements to be met will be set out in invitation to tender documentation which will be made available via Pro-contract.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: Information, formalities and necessary requirements to be met will be set out in invitation to tender documentation which will be made available via Pro-contract.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: — Additional information and visibility of Invitation toTender documentation is via https://procontract.due-north.com/register and the opportunity is entitled ‘Supply and Installation of GM Connected Wayfinding Products’,
— Please note the return date and time in IV.3.4 is the final date for submission of the completed invitation to tender,
— This procurement process will be conducted through the ProContract e-tendering portal and any submission made outside of this portal will be disqualified,
— All communications, including tender submissions must bewritten in English and priced in pounds sterling,
— Nothing in this procurement process is intended to form any express or implied contractual relationship between the parties unless and until the award of a contract is concluded,
— Any contract entered into as a result of this procurement will be considered to be a contract governed by English Law and subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Courts of England and Wales,

— TfGM is not liable for any costs, fees or expenses (including third party costs, fees or expenses) incurred by those expressing an interest in, negotiating or tendering for this contract opportunity,
— TfGM reserves the right to terminate this procurement process or to amend or vary the process at any time prior to the conclusion of the award of contract without liability to any party,
— Applicants are advised that the most economically advantageous tender or any tender will not automatically be accepted,
— There is no guarantee given relating to of any level of works to be instructed via the framework agreement(s).
